article.name: FAQ: Subscription and Account Management
article.title: FAQ: Subscription and Account Management
article.body:
In this article, you can find frequently asked questions about your KnowBe4 product subscriptions and account management. If you have additional questions that this article does not include, please submit a ticket to our support team.

Where can I see when my subscription will expire?

In your KSAT console, click your email in the top-right corner and click Account Settings. In the Account Information section, under Purchased Products and Add-ons you can see your Subscription End Date for any of the KnowBe4 products you've purchased.

How do I upgrade, renew, or cancel my subscription?

Contact your Customer Success Manager or Account Manager for assistance.

I don't know who my Customer Success Manager is. How can I find out?

In your KSAT console, click your email in the top-right corner, then click Account Settings. In the Account Information section, under Customer Success Manager, you can see their name and email address.

How do I unsubscribe from the KnowBe4 newsletter?

Scroll down to the bottom of the email you received and click the Unsubscribe link or email opt-out@knowbe4.com.

Where can I find information about pricing levels?

Learn about our different subscription levels by visiting our KnowBe4 Security Awareness Training Pricing & Subscription Levels page.

If you're not currently a KnowBe4 customer, you can request a quote on the above page or by emailing sales@knowbe4.com

images.alt:
This image displays the **Account Settings** user interface of a web application, focusing on subscription and product details.

**UI Structure and Navigation:**

1.  **Header:** The top left features the title "**Account Settings**" with an adjacent gear/cog icon.
2.  **Navigation Panel (Left Sidebar):** A vertical menu organizes account sections.
    *   **Current Section:** "**Account Information**" is highlighted in blue/teal and expanded (indicated by a down arrow).
    *   **Sub-Sections (under Account Information):** Purchased Products and Add-ons, Account Privacy, Organization Information, Environment Information, Branding, and Placeholders.
    *   **Collapsible Sections:** User Management, Phishing, Training, Account Integrations, and Reports are listed with right-pointing chevron icons, indicating they are collapsed.
    *   **Action Button:** "**Expand All**" is located at the bottom of the sidebar.
3.  **Content Panel (Main Area):** Displays details for the selected section.
    *   **Section Title:** "**Account Information**" (large, orange/brown text).
    *   **Sub-Header:** "**Purchased Products and Add-ons**" (large, black text).

**Subscription Details (Content Panel Data):**

The panel lists various subscribed products with specific metrics, including **Subscription End Date** (highlighted by orange rectangular boxes, indicating focus or extraction).

| Product Name | Details Displayed | Subscription End Date |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **KnowBe4 Security Awareness Training** | Subscription Level: Diamond, Number of Seats: 100, Active Users: 275 | **12/29/2030** |
| **KnowBe4 Student Edition** | Number of Seats: 0, Active Users: 0 | **05/02/2026** |
| **PhishER** | *(Other details omitted)* | **03/01/2025** |
| **SecurityCoach** | *(Other details omitted)* | **01/01/2027** |
| **AIDA** | *(Other details omitted)* | **03/01/2030** |

**Footer Context:**

The content panel ends with the sub-header "**Account Privacy**," indicating the start of the next section's information.

images.alt:
This image is a screenshot of an "Account Settings" page within a web application, likely a security training or compliance platform (KnowBe4).

**UI Layout and Navigation:**

*   **Header:** The main title is "Account Settings," accompanied by a green wrench and gear icon. A search bar labeled "Search by keyword..." is located in the top right.
*   **Sidebar Navigation (Left Panel):**
    *   **Account Information (Expanded):** This section is currently active/expanded (indicated by a downward caret) and lists sub-sections: Customer Success Manager, Purchased Products and Add-ons, Account Privacy, Organization Information, Environment Information, Branding, and Placeholders.
    *   **Collapsed Sections:** User Management, Phishing, Training, Account Integrations, and Reports are listed below with right-facing chevrons, indicating they are collapsed. An "Expand All" link is at the bottom.
*   **Content Area (Right Panel):** The content area displays the details for the "Account Information" section.

**Content Details:**

1.  **Main Section Title:** "Account Information" (in green).
2.  **Customer Success Manager (Highlighted):** This section, outlined in orange (likely for emphasis in the screenshot), displays contact information:
    *   Title: "Customer Success Manager"
    *   Name (partially redacted): "KB4 [Redacted Text]"
    *   Email (partially redacted): "[Redacted Text]@knowbe4.com"
3.  **Purchased Products and Add-ons:** This section details current subscriptions:
    *   **KnowBe4 Security Awareness Training:**
        *   Subscription Level: Diamond
        *   Subscription End Date: 01/01/2026
        *   Number of Seats: 1001
        *   Active Users: 86
    *   **PhishER:**
        *   Subscription End Date: 12/31/2025
    *   **Compliance Plus:**
        *   Subscription End Date: 12/31/2025
    *   **SecurityCoach:**
        *   Subscription End Date: 12/31/2025

images.alt:
This image depicts a standard digital communication footer, providing copyright, legal, and subscription management options for the entity "KnowBe4, Inc."

**Text and Context:**

1.  **Copyright Statement (Static Text):** The top line reads, "Copyright © 2014-2025 KnowBe4, Inc. All rights reserved."
2.  **Legal Hyperlinks:** A set of three navigation hyperlinks are displayed in orange text: "Privacy | Legal | Terms."
3.  **Alternative Opt-Out Text:** Instructions are provided for non-click-based opting out: "Don't like to click? Email opt-out requests should be sent to [email address]."

**UI Elements and Functionality:**

1.  **Unsubscribe Button (Action Button):** A rectangular button, labeled "Unsubscribe," provides the primary mechanism for ending subscription service. The button text is centered and rendered in black against a dark orange or yellow-brown background.
2.  **Email Hyperlink (Secondary Opt-Out):** An active hyperlink displays the email address for direct opt-out requests: `opt-out@knowbe4.com`. This functions as a mailto link.

*(Note: The prominent orange rectangular borders around the 'Unsubscribe' button and the email address are present in the source image, suggesting emphasis or capture focus, but are not standard UI elements.)*
